A cheetah that can't run due to a genetic mutation that affects its muscles, causing it to have a unique ability to crawl at incredible speeds.
A cheetah that is injured and can't run, but has developed a new way of hunting using its sharp claws and agility to catch prey.
A cheetah that has been trained to use a wheelchair to move around and hunt prey, showcasing its intelligence and adaptability.
A cheetah that has lost its ability to run due to an environmental factor, such as a desert or savannah that is too hot and dry for it to run.
A cheetah that has been domesticated and is now kept as a pet, showcasing its playful and affectionate nature despite its inability to run.
